channel.title: Internet on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on Personal Blog

item.title: Proxies
item.description: Forward Proxy # Forward proxy or proxy sits in front of a set of clients (eg. web broswers) and forwards requests to a server on the internet. Purpose is to filter content, block requests or protect identity of clients. Reverse Proxy # A Reverse proxy sits in front of web servers and forward client (eg. web broswer) requests to the servers. Purpose is to increase security & performance of web service provided by the web servers.
